message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing an initial price of $20,000. I believe it's a fair starting point for discussion.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. Given my budget, I'd be happy to purchase the product for $12,000. This seems fair considering the value I place on the item.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To make this work for me, I could come down to $18,000.  This price reflects the true worth of the product.

Alice, while I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $18,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $12,000.  It's the most I can afford, and it's a fair price considering what I'm looking for.
